days.title: Day 1 - Arrival & Eiffel Tower
activities: Morning: Arrive in Paris and check into hotel
Afternoon: Visit the iconic Eiffel Tower and take photos
Evening: Enjoy a romantic dinner cruise on the Seine River
Night: Admire the Eiffel Tower light show

days.title: Day 2 - Art & Culture
activities: Morning: Explore the Louvre Museum and see the Mona Lisa
Afternoon: Stroll through the Tuileries Garden
Late Afternoon: Visit the Orsay Museum
Evening: Walk along the Champs-Élysées

days.title: Day 3 - Historic Paris
activities: Morning: Visit Notre-Dame Cathedral (exterior)
Afternoon: Explore the charming Montmartre district
Late Afternoon: Visit Sacré-Cœur Basilica
Evening: Enjoy local cuisine at a traditional French bistro

days.title: Day 4 - Palace & Gardens
activities: Morning: Day trip to the Palace of Versailles
Afternoon: Explore the magnificent gardens and Hall of Mirrors
Evening: Return to Paris and relax

days.title: Day 5 - Shopping & Departure
activities: Morning: Last-minute shopping at Galeries Lafayette
Afternoon: Visit the Latin Quarter and enjoy a farewell lunch
Evening: Depart from Paris with beautiful memories

days.title: Day 1 - Arrival & Royal London
activities: Morning: Arrive in London and check into hotel
Afternoon: Visit Buckingham Palace and watch the Changing of the Guard
Late Afternoon: Explore St. James's Park
Evening: Enjoy traditional fish and chips

days.title: Day 2 - Historic Landmarks
activities: Morning: Visit the Tower of London and see the Crown Jewels
Afternoon: Walk across Tower Bridge
Late Afternoon: Explore the British Museum
Evening: Experience the West End theatre district

days.title: Day 3 - Culture & Markets
activities: Morning: Visit the British Museum or Tate Modern
Afternoon: Explore Borough Market for local food
Late Afternoon: Walk along the South Bank
Evening: Enjoy a pub dinner in Covent Garden

days.title: Day 4 - Royal & Modern
activities: Morning: Visit Westminster Abbey
Afternoon: See Big Ben and Houses of Parliament
Late Afternoon: Explore Hyde Park and Kensington Gardens
Evening: Experience London's vibrant nightlife

days.title: Day 1 - Arrival & Gothic Quarter
activities: Morning: Arrive in Barcelona and check into hotel
Afternoon: Explore the Gothic Quarter (Barri Gòtic)
Late Afternoon: Visit Barcelona Cathedral
Evening: Enjoy tapas at a local restaurant

days.title: Day 2 - Gaudí's Masterpieces
activities: Morning: Visit the iconic Sagrada Família
Afternoon: Explore Park Güell with its colorful mosaics
Late Afternoon: Walk along Passeig de Gràcia
Evening: See Casa Batlló and Casa Milà (La Pedrera)

days.title: Day 3 - Beach & Markets
activities: Morning: Visit La Boqueria Market for fresh produce
Afternoon: Relax at Barceloneta Beach
Late Afternoon: Explore the Port Vell area
Evening: Enjoy seafood paella by the waterfront

days.title: Day 4 - Montjuïc & Art
activities: Morning: Visit Montjuïc Hill and the Magic Fountain
Afternoon: Explore the National Art Museum of Catalonia
Late Afternoon: Visit the Olympic Stadium
Evening: Enjoy panoramic city views and dinner

days.title: Day 5 - Last Explorations & Departure
activities: Morning: Visit the Picasso Museum
Afternoon: Last-minute shopping on Las Ramblas
Late Afternoon: Enjoy a farewell coffee at a local café
Evening: Depart from Barcelona with wonderful memories
